metadata.title: CVE-2022-35651 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stored XSS and blind SSRF vulnerability was found in Moodle, occurs dueto insufficient sanitization of user-supplied data in the SCORM trackdetails. A remote attacker can trick the victim to follow a speciallycrafted link and execute arbitrary HTML and script code in user's browserin context of vulnerable website to steal potentially sensitiveinformation, change appearance of the web page, can perform phishing anddrive-by-download attacks.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
